level.heading: Sanitary Inspectors--Reports.
level.text: Said Inspectors shall be respectively required to make, at least once in 2 weeks, a report to said Director of the Department of Human Services, in writing, of their inspections, which shall be preserved on file.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 16-191 validated a previously made technical correction.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Office of Director of Public Health abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-101.
